name: I Am Data
description:
I Am Data is a Fast paced, Neon soaked, First Person Shooter set in a Digital World.

It's First and only current game mode will have you Blasting and Dashing your way through wave after wave of Enemies and Power ups as you test your Skills against the hordes.


EARLY ACCESS

As an Early Access title it still has miles ahead of it's journey to reaching it's true potential. But with your help it will undoubtedly reach it.

SEE YOU ON THE GRID




    -Key Features-

      Endless Waves of PEW PEW PEW!!!

      • PEW PEW PEW

      Power Ups!

      • From Missiles to Bombs to Triple Shot!!!!!

      Local Highscore (Global to come)!

      • A Must Have Feature

      A Kick Ass Sound Track

      • (also a must have feature)
